resources.string: Looks like you\'re not connected to the internet, reconnect and try again.
Oops, it looks like something has gone wrong on your side, please try again.
Oops, it looks like something has gone wrong on our side, please try again.
Something has gone wrong, if you see this message often please contact us.
There was an image we couldn\'t download, but it\'s OK, we\'ll still try to get the next one.
Location Permission is not been allowed. Please allow it and press the start button to try again.
